page.title: 02Attitudes Village Life
page.content: I like living in Aspley Guise because it's a nice peaceful area and there's lots of places to go to also there's lots of entertainment like cubs, concerts and parties in the Parish Hall and there's lots of pubs.Also there's the common where there's swings, football, cricket, bowling and a big castle that children can play on.My mum and dad like living in Aspley Guise because it's peaceful and so that David and I can play with our friends, also mum and dad like it because my dad can get to work quicker on the motorway also the railway is nearby. {(Gregory)} It is quiet and sunny, the people are friendly, it has nice walks. We have chickens, a cat and dog and we grow vegetables. We couldn't have all these in a flat in a big city. {(Emily) t.
